label: 満済准后日記
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
見出し読み: まんさい じゅごう にっき
見出し読み_mod: まんさい じゅごう にっき
説明文: A diary written by the Shingon monk Mansai (1378-1435), who served as abbot of Daigoji and as one of the leaders of Toji, while being a close supporter of Ashikaga Yoshinori. The diary is an extensive and important source, covering the years from 1411 to 1435 in forty-eight volumes.
